alert.note: Alert for Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 13 at 6:00PM CDT until May 13 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR RANKIN COUNTY... At 559 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Richland to Pelahatchie, and are nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Flowood around 605 PM CDT. Pearl and Brandon around 625 PM CDT. Pisgah around 635 PM CDT. Richland, Florence and Monterey around 645 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Puckett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
